commit_list.repo_description: Collection of useful bash scripts for use with remote (https://github.com/benalavi/remote)

commit_list.message:
Merge pull request #19 from Dhaulagiri/br-multi-fix

Properly re-export the build directory

Merge pull request #23 from benalavi/freetype

Update graphicsmagick to properly reference freetype2 on ubuntu 14.04 (and drop cedar)
Fix buildpack locations in README

Update graphicsmagick to 1.3.23 which properly links freetype2 on ubuntu 14.04 (see https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=731015#10)
Drop support for heroku cedar stack (end of life Nov 4, 2015)
Update README with new usage info for heroku's native multi-buildpack support

Merge pull request #21 from benalavi/heroku-multi-buildpacks

Echo buildpack name as heroku's multi support says detect script must
Echo buildpack name as heroku's multi support says detect script must

Merge pull request #12 from benalavi/cedar-14

Get rid of vulcan dependency and recompile for both cedar and cedar-14 stacks
Update README w/ information about multiple binaries and building with Vagrant

Get rid of vulcan dependency, re-package for cedar-14, and use Vagrant to build local cedar-14 VM
Support cedar and cedar-14 builds using the STACK environment variable (https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/buildpack-api#stacks)
updated doc

commit_list.message:
* removed ffmpeg wrapper (no longer converts to wav for you)
* refactored w/ API changes for Waveform class
* removed contest dependency for tests
* fixed mono-audio sources (RubyAudio gives mono channel data as a single value, while >1 channel is an array, so always wrap in an Array)
* updated README
